SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: OPERATING A SHELTER FOR HOMELESS AND INJURED ANIMALS HELPING ANIMALS AND PEOPLE MAKE A CONNECTION, THROUGH EDUCATION, TRAINING AND ADOPTION. WITH A FOCUS ON BUILDING STRONG, HEALTHY RELATIONSHIPS BETWEEN HUMANS AND ANIMALS, THE SHELTER WILL PROVIDE TRAINING OPPORTUNITIES AND FACILITIES FOR USE BY COMMUNITY GROUPS AND INDIVIDUALS.
